name: launchpad
description: Manage and set up a development environment for Bitwarden

scripts.dev:api: npm run shell -- 'cd repositories/server/src/Api && dotnet run'
scripts.dev:identity: npm run shell -- 'cd repositories/server/src/Identity && dotnet run'
scripts.dev:web: npm run shell -- 'cd repositories/clients/apps/web && npm run build:bit:dev:watch'
scripts.dev:browser: npm run shell -- 'cd repositories/clients/apps/browser && npm run build:watch'
scripts.dev:browser:mv2: npm run shell -- 'cd repositories/clients/apps/browser && npm run build:watch:mv2'
scripts.dev:desktop: npm run shell -- 'cd repositories/clients/apps/desktop && npm run electron'
scripts.dev:sdk_desktop: npm run build:sdk && npm run parallelize -- "npm run dev:sdk" "npm run dev:desktop"
scripts.dev:web_browser: npm run parallelize -- "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:browser"
scripts.dev:api_identity_web_browser: npm run parallelize -- "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:identity" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:browser"

author: Andreas Coroiu (@coroiu)
